short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly Earn Microsoft Rewards Points with a Single Click to Automate your Bing Searches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly maximize your Microsoft Rewards points with a single click using our Bing Search Automation Chrome Extension - Rewards Search Automator. This innovative tool automates Bing searches, supercharging your Bing Rewards journey. Best extension to Automate your Bing Searches.

Best Bing Search Automator Chrome Extension!

NOTE: This extension is running free with the help of Amazon affiliate links and ads shown on the announcement page. Also, We do not promote any malware or adware and are committed for a good user experience.

#rsa #rewards #search #automator #bing #abs

How to use the extension: tmtechnomania.github.io

v1.5.0

- Fixed Issue with selected search niche was not searching as expected.
- Now show the site safety status below the extension icon.
- Partially implemented: find and log the price trends for products as well. Will be available with notification with upcoming update.

v1.4.9 - Repeat search glitch fix.

v1.4.8 - Minor timing improvements

v1.4.7 - Sequence change for clearing site data and query patch included

v1.4.6 - Bug fixes, where searches were running instead of schedule, and minor changes on patch.

v1.4.5 - Patch reintroduced with option to toggle on or off, search niches also introduced.

v1.4.4 - Patch removed to resolve the logout issue.

v1.4.3 - Patch for latest changes by MS for unlocking device based point collection (remember not to open any other Bing URL while using the extension).

v1.4.2 - Bug Fixes for service worker gone inactive and causing non functioning of schedule function.

What's new in v1.4.1:

- Adjusted the delay between Schedule search options
- Changed the implementational logic of the schedule option to achieve better results while using the schedule options.
- The extension will now keep trying if for some reason the tab got frozen or not response.

What's new in v1.4.0:

- Adjusted typing algorithm speed for more human like appearance.
- Introducing All new Device Toggle option to simulate mobile device even when you are not searching for Bing. Switch to mobile view with one click is a great alternative to Mobile View Switcher. This is one of the best Smartphone simulator on computer. This can also help you to test responsive design means it can help developers as well!!
- Minimum delays for Min and Max delay input are now 5 and 10 seconds respectively.
- Install screen glitch fix.
- Removed Samsung Galaxy s21 line-up from simulation.
- Minor bug fixes.

NOTE: In order to use schedule option perfectly, you have to stop your browser from running in the background.

What was in v1.3.6:

- Major bug fixes - glitches in performing searches, searches not running but affiliate page opens, error in using schedules search option.
- Reintroduced the blinking dot for activity status.
- Timing & delay fix.

Major Update v1.3.5:

Welcome to the latest upgrade of Rewards Search Automator, your go-to Bing Rewards companion! In this version, we've listened to your feedback and fine-tuned the extension for an even more tailored experience.

Enhancements:

Customizable Search Speed: Now, you have the power to set your search speed according to your preferences. Choose from a range of options that suit your needs, ensuring a personalized and efficient Bing Rewards journey.

Advanced Scheduling Options: Take control of your searches with our new scheduling features. Set it to "NEVER" for manual initiation, "After Startup" for automatic activation upon browser opening, "After 5 Mins" for a variable delay of 5-7.5 mins, or "After 15 Mins" with a variable delay between 15-20 mins. Tailor your schedule to match your Microsoft policy requirements.

User-Requested Features: We've removed predefined search speed options to give you the flexibility you asked for. Our commitment to user satisfaction is reflected in these user-driven changes.

With Rewards Search Automator version 1.3.5, we're empowering you to maximize your Bing Rewards points effortlessly. Whether you're a seasoned Bing Rewards enthusiast or just starting, this update ensures a seamless and customizable experience. Upgrade now and elevate your Bing Rewards journey to new heights!

version 1.3.4:
- Fast is between 1-5 seconds per search for ban protection.
- Slow is between 9-13 seconds per search for ban protection.
- Variable (Best) is between 9-18 seconds that is best for anti automation detection.
- Removed that debugger notification for PC searches.

version 1.3.3:
- Fast is between 2-4 seconds per search for ban protection.
- Slow is between 4-6 seconds per search for ban protection.
- Variable (Best) is between 3-12 seconds that is best for anti automation detection.

Older updates:
- Experience enhanced search techniques for precise and effective automation.
- We value your privacy - our extension now requires minimal permissions for secure browsing.
- Customize your search speed, from a deliberate 2 seconds per search to lightning-fast 750ms.
- Achieve an impressive 99% success rate on mobile searches with refined mechanisms.
- Enjoy an intuitive user interface for seamless navigation and control.
- Fine-tuned mobile search functionality for superior accuracy.
- Stay informed with a dynamic progress bar tracking your search activity.
- Optimized performance with "Fast" mode completing searches in just 750ms.
- Diversify your search patterns with an expanded range of mobile device simulations.
- Add an element of unpredictability with random mobile devices.
- Flexible search timing, accommodating different PC capabilities.
- Access over 350,000+ search terms for increased search diversity.
- Benefit from subtle refinements for an enhanced search experience.
- Unlock the power of automated Bing searches and elevate your Bing Rewards experience. Whether you're aiming to earn rewards or simply optimize your routine, our tool has you covered.

Control your search speed, balance precision and efficiency with "Slow," turbocharge your searches with "Fast," or enjoy the best of both worlds with "Variable." Boost your points, and reap the benefits of your Bing Rewards journey with Rewards Search Automator (also known as Bing Search Automator or Auto Searcher for Bing).

Note: We collect anonymous data as per the Chrome Webstore Policy from v1.3.5 to current version
